name: GDPR, CCPA, PECR friendly cookie free website visitor tracking
author: Unrive.io

sections.description:
Unrive.io is a privacy preserving, cookieless and anonymised website tracking for your website completely free. Allowing you to track your website activity, without compromising privacy. No cookies, IP tracking or digital fingerprinting.

GDPR and CCPA Visitor Tracking plugin for wordPress is a powerful plugin which provides you with detailed insights into your website’s traffic, allowing you to make decisions about your blog content and marketing. With Unrive.io Visitor Tracking plugin for wordPress, you can track visitor behaviour in real-time, count and track pageviews, and track the performance of individual blog posts and pages. You can see where your visitors are coming from, including search engines, referrals and social channels.

Our free wordPress plugin is a privacy preserving, cookie-less website visitor tracking for your wordPress blog. Allowing you to track your visitors, without compromising privacy. It’s simple to use, your visitor statistics are presented in a user friendly, intuitive way. It’s private, with zero IP tracking, digital fingerprinting, or cookies. The tracking code is super lightweight, it’s less than 1kb in size. The platform is friendly with all major privacy laws including the GDPR, CCPA and PECR. The data is yours, We never share your data with anyone.

Requirements

This plugin requires a free account which can be created at Register Page

The plugin will connect via API to the service, your free API key can be found here once registered.

Disclaimer

This software package has not been tested to meet certain requirements and is not suitable for use on any item which can cause death or personal injury. Including but not limited to life critical applications, services or websites.

Credits

Unrive.io, Vertigo Street Ventures Ltd, Company Number: 14322223
